function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Average and standard deviations of the time of exposures to each number of people provide valuable information for quantitative risk assessment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases due to contact with different numbers of agents in a built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity on exposure time calculation method","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear restrictions on building occupancy","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate information on maximum exposure time","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupant exposure in confined spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure by face-to-face contact within a social distance radius","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure by being in the same room","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical contact between pedestrians in confined spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupant exposure in confined spaces based on social distance radius","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through face-to-face contact within social distance radius","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modelling assumption based on incomplete understanding of disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on assumptions about disease transmission mechanisms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retrofitting existing microscopic crowd models without considering specific disease transmission characteristics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of representation of space usage of pedestrians at a microscopic scale in current disease-spreading models","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive sub-models in crowd models for performing occupant exposure analysis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to assess the impact of disease spread in confined spaces without microscopic crowd models","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on macroscopic epidemiological models","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for individual mobility patterns and heterogeneity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited consideration of population heterogeneity in transportation environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent social distancing recommendations in different countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data to fully support spatial separation rules for disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for flexible disease transmission models to accommodate different assumptions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of attribution in reusing published material","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on construction professionals’ perceptions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability of perceptions among different groups and over of covid-19 decreasing over time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Descending trend in the level of concern for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorrect prediction of return to normalcy","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on the construction industry","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Change in working time due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Access to software and hardware for job performance during covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible transmission of covid-19 during the evaluation process","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protection measures for participants during the evaluation process","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to distancing and hygiene protocols during post-evaluation discussions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction professionals expressing concerns about handling family issues during covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in ratings of concerns about changes in project time/cost/scope between group a and group
